en: But if you want to keep them , I would say 5 years in the cellar .

en: And then with the red wines from the Signature they only spent eight months in the French oak .
baseline: 然后,他们只花了8个月在法国橡木里喝了来自《签名》的红酒。

en: It was discovered in the year of 1925 by a professor called Abraham Perold in the University of Stellenbosch .
baseline: 它于1925年由一个名叫亚伯拉罕·佩罗德的教授在斯坦布尔顿大学发现。
